experiment.title: Front Service Pod Restart on Cordonned Node

text.text: *Front Service Pod Restart on Cordonned Node*

experiment.description: During a node maintenance, we may need to cordon a Kubernetes node. What is the impact on users if the frontend pod must be restarted while on that node?
